trans-unit.source: Isolates into a separate class methods that are used by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control and can be overridden by developers who extend the control, but are rarely needed by page developers.
trans-unit.target: Aísla en una clase independiente los métodos que el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> utiliza y que los desarrolladores que extienden el control pueden invalidar, pero que rara vez necesitan los desarrolladores de páginas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is the largest class in the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> es la clase más grande en el conjunto de controles de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: It is also among the most important Web Parts classes because it is used on every Web page that contains Web Parts controls, and it coordinates and manages all Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: También es entre las clases de elementos Web más importantes porque se usa en todas las páginas Web que contiene controles de elementos Web, y coordina y administra todos los controles de elementos Web en una página.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class is used so frequently, and because it contains so many exposed methods, some methods needed mostly by control developers who are extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class.
trans-unit.target: Dado que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> clase se utiliza con mucha frecuencia, y porque contiene muchos métodos expuestos, algunos métodos necesitan principalmente los programadores de controles que se están ampliando el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control están contenidos en la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> clase.

trans-unit.source: This isolation of less-used methods into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class simplifies the API of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, and the isolated methods do not appear on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object in IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Este aislamiento de los métodos usados con menor en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> clase simplifica la API de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> clase y los métodos aislados no aparecen en la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> objeto en IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: Developers who use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class are likely to have scenarios where they need to inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and customize it extensively.
trans-unit.target: Los desarrolladores que utilizan el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> clase suelen tener escenarios donde deben heredar de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar y personalizarlo en gran medida.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are building a Web portal application or a packaged set of Web Parts controls with custom display modes, custom zones, custom verbs, custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and other extensions of the base Web Parts user interface (UI), in many cases (not all) you will need to override and extend some of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> members.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, si está creando una aplicación de portal Web o un conjunto empaquetado de controles de elementos Web con modos de presentación personalizado, personalizado zonas, verbos personalizados, personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles y otras extensiones de la interfaz de usuario elementos Web de base (UI), en muchos casos (no todos) debe invalidar y extienden algunos de los <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> miembros.

trans-unit.source: And although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is sealed so you cannot inherit from it, your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class will likely need to call a number of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods in order to manage Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: Aunque la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> clase está sellada, por lo que no puede heredar de él, su personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> clase probablemente tenga que llamar a un número de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> métodos para administrar los controles de elementos Web en una página.

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class provides a server control that has no UI and is never visible on a page.
trans-unit.target: Al igual que el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> (clase), el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> clase proporciona un control de servidor que no tiene ninguna interfaz de usuario y nunca está visible en una página.

trans-unit.source: Unlike <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class is never declared in the markup of a page; it is strictly a worker object that performs background tasks.
trans-unit.target: A diferencia de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>, la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> clase nunca se declara en el marcado de una página; es estrictamente un objeto de trabajo que realiza tareas en segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: The typical way of using it is demonstrated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which references it by means of the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> property, and uses the referenced object to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se muestra la forma habitual de su uso por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> (clase), que hace referencia a él por medio de la protegido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Internals%2A> propiedad y usa el objeto de referencia para llamar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> class contains only methods; there are no properties or events.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> clase solo contiene métodos; no hay propiedades ni eventos.

trans-unit.source: All the methods in the class involve managing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or connections between controls.
trans-unit.target: Todos los métodos de la clase implican administrar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles o las conexiones entre los controles.

trans-unit.source: To handle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for adding them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), removing them <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), handling events <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), getting or setting details about their relationship to their zone (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), or setting basic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties (for example, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Para controlar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controles, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> incluye métodos para agregarlos (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.AddWebPart%2A>), eliminarlos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.RemoveWebPart%2A>), control de eventos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.CallOnDeleting%2A>), obtener o establecer detalles sobre la relación a su zona (por ejemplo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A>), o la configuración básica <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> propiedades del control (por ejemplo, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A>).

trans-unit.source: To handle connections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> includes methods for deleting them (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), setting which transformer object to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), setting whether a connection is shared and whether it is static (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>), and setting a connection error message to use (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Para controlar las conexiones, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals> incluye métodos para eliminarlas (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A>), establecer qué objeto de la clase transformer usar (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A>), si se establece si se comparte una conexión y si es estática (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29>) y la configuración de un mensaje de error de conexión que utilice (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A>).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> being added to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que se va a agregar a la colección de controles del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o un control de servidor a la colección de controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> de una página Web.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for closing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que se ha seleccionado para cerrarse.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Llama al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnClosing(System.EventArgs)" /> del control especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited the connect display mode.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que ha entrado o salido del modo de presentación de conexión.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Llama al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnConnectModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> del control especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> seleccionado para eliminarse.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Llama al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnDeleting(System.EventArgs)" /> del control especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that has entered or exited edit display mode.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que ha entrado o salido del modo de presentación de edición.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Llama al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.OnEditModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> del control especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> seleccionado para eliminarse.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> especificado se ha eliminado.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the connection has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si se ha eliminado la conexión.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del objeto que se va a crear.

trans-unit.source: Creates an object based on the parameter passed to the method.
trans-unit.target: Crea un objeto basado en el parámetro que se pasó al método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> of the same type as <paramref name="type" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> del mismo tipo que <paramref name="type" />.

trans-unit.source: The method uses the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> class to create the type, an alternative that offers better performance than using the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El método usa la <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeGenerator> clase para crear el tipo, una alternativa que ofrece un mejor rendimiento que el uso de la <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that has been selected for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> seleccionado para eliminarse.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property to indicate that the specified connection object has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Establece una propiedad que indica que se ha eliminado el objeto de conexión especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A> method is one step in the process of terminating an existing connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.DeleteConnection%2A> método es un paso en el proceso de terminar una conexión existente entre dos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> u otros controles de servidor en una página Web.

trans-unit.source: It sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> property value to `true` to indicate that `connection` is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Establece el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.ConnectionDeleted%2A> valor de propiedad `true` para indicar que `connection` se elimina.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that resides in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que reside en una zona.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of a zone that contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el id. de una zona que contiene el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o control de servidor especificado.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the ID of the zone that contains <paramref name="webPart" />.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que representa el id. de la zona donde se encuentra <paramref name="webPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method returns the ID of the zone that contains the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> método devuelve el identificador de la zona que contiene el control al que hace referencia el `webPart` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property of `webPart` references the actual zone object that contains `webPart`, not the ID of the zone.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> propiedad de `webPart` hace referencia al objeto de zona real que contiene `webPart`, no el identificador de la zona.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is currently closed, the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> property is `null`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> method will return the ID of the last zone that `webPart` was in prior to being closed.
trans-unit.target: Si `webPart` está actualmente cerrado, el valor de su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> propiedad es `null`y el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.GetZoneID%2A> método devolverá el identificador de la última de la zona que `webPart` tenía antes de que se va a cerrar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que se utiliza para conectar controles.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contiene los datos de estado previamente guardados.

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Carga los datos de estado previamente guardados de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que participa en una conexión entre controles.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> u otro control de servidor que se va a quitar.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Quita un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> u otro control de servidor de la colección de controles del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes `webPart` from the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's collection of Web Parts controls that it maintains for the page.
trans-unit.target: Quita `webPart` actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> colección de controles de elementos Web que mantiene para la página del control.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is used to connect controls.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que se utiliza para conectar controles.

trans-unit.source: Saves state data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object that participates in a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: Guarda los datos de estado de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que participa en una conexión entre controles.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contiene los datos de estado guardados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A> method saves configuration data that is created when a user configures a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control on a Web page as part of a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SaveConfigurationState%2A> método guarda los datos de configuración que se crean cuando un usuario configura un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control en una página Web como parte de una conexión entre los controles.

trans-unit.source: This configuration data is then reloaded each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control is rendered, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Estos datos de configuración, a continuación, se vuelve a cargar cada vez que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> control se representa mediante el uso de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.LoadConfigurationState%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> that participates in a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que participa en una conexión con otro control.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: Una cadena que contiene el texto del mensaje de error.

trans-unit.source: Establishes an errors message, and causes the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> object that is responsible for rendering a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to render that message rather than the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: Establece un mensaje de error y hace que el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" />, responsable de representar un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />, represente dicho mensaje en lugar del contenido del control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> method allows you to associate an error message with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that participates in connections.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetConnectErrorMessage%2A> método le permite asociar un mensaje de error con un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control que participa en las conexiones.

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs when another control is forming a connection with the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter, then after the connection process has failed, the error message is displayed in the user interface (UI), rather than the contents of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: Si se produce un error cuando otro control forma una conexión con el control al que hace referencia el `webPart` parámetro, a continuación, después de que el proceso de conexión ha dado error, el mensaje de error se muestra en la interfaz de usuario (UI), en lugar del contenido de `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object associated with `webPart` renders the error message in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> objeto asociado a `webPart` representa el mensaje de error en su <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> u otro control de servidor que puede tener datos de personalización compartidos.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si <c>webPart</c> tiene datos compartidos.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Establece una propiedad en un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o en otro control de servidor que indica si el control tiene datos de personalización compartidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has shared personalization data.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasSharedData%2A> método indica si `webPart` tiene datos de personalización compartidos.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `hasSharedData` parameter that is passed into the method is assigned to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la `hasSharedData` parámetro que se pasa al método se asigna a la `webPart` del control <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasSharedData%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control that can have user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> u otro control de servidor que puede tener datos de personalización del usuario.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> has shared data.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si <c>webPart</c> tiene datos compartidos.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property on a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or other server control indicating whether the control has user personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Establece una propiedad en un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o en otro control de servidor que indica si el control tiene datos de personalización del usuario.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A> method indicates whether `webPart` has individual user personalization data, as opposed to shared data.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetHasUserData%2A> método indica si `webPart` tiene datos de personalización de usuario individual, en lugar de datos compartido.

trans-unit.source: The method assigns the value of the `hasUserData` parameter to the `webPart` control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El método asigna el valor de la `hasUserData` parámetro a la `webPart` del control <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HasUserData%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para el que este método establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> is closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> está cerrado en una página.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> property of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsClosed%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsClosed%2A> propiedad de `webPart`.

trans-unit.source: This method does not actually close `webPart`; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is closed.
trans-unit.target: Este método no cierra realmente `webPart`; solo se establece la propiedad que indica si `webPart` está cerrado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is shared.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> método llama a un método en una clase base para establecer una propiedad que indica si se comparte una instancia determinada de un control.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a shared control means a control that is visible to all users of a page.
trans-unit.target: En el conjunto de controles de elementos Web, un control compartido es un control que es visible para todos los usuarios de una página.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a per-user control, which is visible only to the specific user who added the control to the page.
trans-unit.target: Esto difiere de un control por usuario, que solo es visible para el usuario concreto que agregó el control a la página.

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: Para más información sobre la personalización y compartidos frente a los controles por usuario, consulte [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para el que este método establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si <c>webPart</c> está compartido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsShared" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `webPart` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> realidad, el método no hace que el control al que hace referencia el `webPart` parámetro compartido; solo se establece la propiedad que indica si `webPart` se comparte actualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Conexión <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> entre dos controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is shared.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si <c>connection</c> está compartido.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsShared" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> method does not actually cause the control referenced by the `connection` parameter to be shared; it only sets the property that indicates whether `connection` is currently shared.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsShared%2A> realidad, el método no hace que el control al que hace referencia el `connection` parámetro compartido; solo se establece la propiedad que indica si `connection` se comparte actualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> for which this method sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para el que este método establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" />.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is a standalone control.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si <c>webPart</c> es un control independiente.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStandalone%2A> método establece la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStandalone%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true` on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, it means that the control is not contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Cuando esta propiedad se establece en `true` en un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (control), significa que el control no está contenido dentro de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zona.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control or the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A> method calls a method in a base class to set a property that indicates whether a particular instance of a control is static.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%2A> método llama a un método en una clase base para establecer una propiedad que indica si una instancia determinada de un control es estática.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a static control is a control that is declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: En el conjunto de controles de elementos Web, un control estático es un control que se declara en el marcado de una página Web.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to a dynamic control, which is either added to a page programmatically, or added by a user from a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: Esto difiere de un control dinámico, que se agrega a una página mediante programación, o agregado por un usuario de un catálogo de controles.

trans-unit.source: A static control is inherently a shared control, meaning that it is visible to all users of a page, and although users can close a static control, they can never delete (permanently remove) it.
trans-unit.target: Un control estático es inherentemente un control compartido, lo que significa que es visible para todos los usuarios de una página y, aunque los usuarios pueden cerrar un control estático, nunca puede eliminar (quitar de forma permanente).

trans-unit.source: For more on personalization, static versus dynamic controls, and shared versus per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre la personalización, estáticos frente a los controles dinámicos y compartidos frente a los controles por usuario, consulte [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320).

trans-unit.source: The control for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: Control para el que se establece el valor de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>webPart</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si <c>webPart</c> es estático.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> property value of the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Boolean%29> método se usa para establecer el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.IsStatic%2A> valor de la propiedad del control al que hace referencia el `webPart` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Si `webPart` se declara dentro de una zona en el marcado de una página Web, este método establece el valor de propiedad para `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `webPart` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si `webPart` se agrega a una página mediante programación, o por un usuario a través de la interfaz de usuario (UI) de elementos Web, este método establece el valor de propiedad en `false`.

trans-unit.source: The connection for which the property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: Conexión para la que se va a establecer el valor de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether <c>connection</c> is static.
trans-unit.target: Valor booleano que indica si <c>connection</c> es estático.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> property of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Establece la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic" /> de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method is used to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> property value of the connection referenced by the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetIsStatic%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%2CSystem.Boolean%29> método se usa para establecer el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.IsStatic%2A> valor de la propiedad de la conexión al que hace referencia el `connection` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is declared in the markup of a Web page, this method sets the property value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Si `connection` se declara en el marcado de una página Web, este método establece el valor de propiedad para `true`.

trans-unit.source: If `connection` is added to a page programmatically, or by a user through the Web Parts user interface (UI), then this method sets the property value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Si `connection` se agrega a una página mediante programación, o por un usuario a través de la interfaz de usuario (UI) de elementos Web, este método establece el valor de propiedad en `false`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that creates a connection between server controls.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> que crea una conexión entre controles de servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> to be used with <c>connection</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que se va a usar con <c>connection</c>.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> object to be used in a connection between two server controls.
trans-unit.target: Asigna un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> que se va a utilizar en una conexión entre dos controles de servidor.

trans-unit.source: When a connection between two server controls requires a transformer so that the consumer control can interpret data from the provider control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method is called to supply a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Cuando una conexión entre dos controles de servidor requiere un transformador de modo que el control de consumidor puede interpretar los datos desde el control de proveedor, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> método se llama para proporcionar un determinado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> el objeto a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the connection already has a transformer assigned to it, the object referenced by the `transformer` parameter overrides the existing one; otherwise, the object referenced in the `transformer` parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: Si la conexión ya tiene un transformador asignado, el objeto al que hace referencia el `transformer` parámetro invalida el ya existente; en caso contrario, el objeto al que hace referencia en el `transformer` se usa el parámetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> method whenever you call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method to establish a connection that requires a transformer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control usa la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetTransformer%2A> método cada vez que se llama a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> método para establecer una conexión que requiere un transformador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> whose <c>zoneID</c> property value is being set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> cuyo valor de propiedad <c>zoneID</c> se va a establecer.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the zone that <c>webPart</c> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que contiene el identificador de la zona a la que pertenece <c>webPart</c>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a property that enables a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control to keep the ID of the containing zone.
trans-unit.target: Establece una propiedad que permite que un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> o un control de servidor conserve el id. de la zona que lo contiene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is being added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: Este método es invocado por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controlar cuándo un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control se agrega a una zona.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control tracks the ID for the zone it belongs to, and this method sets the property that keeps the ID value.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control realiza un seguimiento el identificador de la zona a la que pertenece, y este método establece la propiedad que mantiene el valor de identificador.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control for which the method sets a zone index.
trans-unit.target: Un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> para el que el método establece un índice de zona.

trans-unit.source: The index of <c>webPart</c> within its zone relative to other controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Índice de <c>webPart</c> dentro de su zona con respecto a otros controles de la zona.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the specified control within its zone relative to the other <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls within the zone.
trans-unit.target: Establece el índice del control especificado dentro de su zona en relación con los otros controles <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> dentro de la zona.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> method determines the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in its zone, relative to other server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManagerInternals.SetZoneIndex%2A> método determina el ordinal de la posición que `webPart` ocupa en su zona, en relación con otros controles de servidor en la zona.
